text: "Sunset (Bird of Prey)" is a 2000 song by English singer Fatboy Slim. It is the leading single from his third studio album Halfway Between the Gutter and the Stars. It samples The Doors single "Bird of Prey" from An American Prayer. It went to number 9 in the United Kingdom and Scotland, number 49 in New Zealand, number 20 in Norway, number 25 in Ireland and number 63 in Australia. ==Track listings== CD # "Sunset (Bird of Prey)" # "My Game" # "Sunset (Bird of Prey) (Darren Emerson remix)" 12-inch # "Sunset (Bird of Prey)" # "My Game" == References == Category:2000 songs Category:Fatboy Slim songs
title: Sunset (Bird of Prey)
